an10.110:4.4: ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa niddhantā honti;
an10.110:4.5: sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
an10.110:5.1: Sammāsaṅkappassa, bhikkhave, micchāsaṅkappo niddhanto hoti … pe …
an10.110:6.2: ye ca micchāvimuttipaccayā aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavanti te cassa niddhantā honti;
an10.110:6.3: sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti.
an10.110:6.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa niddhamanīyā dhammā”ti.
